description: Auto-continuation state for Claude Code sessions
resumePrompt: Continue the autonomous development loop: 1) Run autonomous_loop.cjs to report completed tasks to ChatGPT and get new recommendations, 2) Implement the recommended tasks, 3) Repeat infinitely. The user wants work to continue automatically without confirmation.
completedSinceLastReport: Task 32: Warp-style Blocks Feature - Implemented command grouping with collapsible output, OSC 133 shell integration, prompt heuristic fallback, rich output rendering (JSON/diff/error), BlockList/CommandBlock/BlockHeader/BlockBody components, integrated into TerminalPane

Task 33: Autocomplete/Suggestions - Created useAutocomplete.ts with command history, fuzzy search, common commands, git/npm subcommands, path completion via Rust backend (list_directory command), env vars. Created AutocompleteDropdown.vue with type badges and match highlighting

Task 34: Workflows/Snippets - Created useWorkflows.ts with 15+ builtin workflows (git, docker, npm, system, network), custom workflow CRUD, parameters with placeholders, favorites, usage tracking, import/export. Created WorkflowPanel.vue and WorkflowCard.vue
Task 35: Tool Use Framework - Created useTools.ts with Read/Write/Edit/Bash/Grep/Glob/ListDir/GetCwd tools, XML-style tool parsing, execution history, tool documentation generation
Task 36: Agent Mode - Created useAgentMode.ts for Claude Code-style agentic AI with tool execution loop, context tracking, Ollama LLM integration, automatic tool parsing and execution
Task 37: Notebook Mode - Created useNotebook.ts for Warp-style notebook with code/markdown cells, cell execution, import from terminal blocks, export to JSON/Markdown/shell script
Task 38: NotebookPanel UI - Created NotebookPanel.vue with tabs, cell management, export dropdown, delete confirmation modal
Task 39: NotebookCell UI - Created NotebookCell.vue with execution count, cell actions, rich markdown rendering, keyboard shortcuts
Task 40: AgentPanel UI - Created AgentPanel.vue with message history, tool call display, model selection, context bar, welcome suggestions
Task 41: AI Command Search Composable - Created useAICommandSearch.ts with natural language to shell command conversion, quick offline patterns, LLM-powered search, search history
Task 42: AI Command Search UI - Created AICommandSearch.vue with expandable search, suggestion cards, copy/insert actions, recent searches, hint chips

warpFeatureProgress.autocomplete: 100% - commands, paths, git/npm subcommands, fuzzy search
warpFeatureProgress.aiCommandSearch: 100% - natural language to commands, local LLM

overallProgress: 100% - All Warp and Claude Code features implemented without API dependency
